#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define min(a,b) ( a<b ? a :b )
ll a[105][105];
ll dp[105][105][105];
int k;
ll fn(int id,int f,int b)
{
    if(id>k+1)
        return 0;
    if(id==k+1)
        return (a[f][k+1]+a[k+1][b]);
    if(dp[id][f][b]!=-1)
        return dp[id][f][b];
    ll ans=min(fn(id+1,id,b)+a[f][id],fn(id+1,f,id)+a[b][id]);
    return dp[id][f][b]=ans;
}
int main()
{
    int t,i,j,x,y,ca;
    ll r;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    for(ca=1;ca<=t;ca++)
    {
        scanf("%d %lld",&k,&r);
        for(i=0;i<k+2;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&x);
            for(j=0;j<k+1;j++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&y);
                scanf("%lld",&a[x][y]);
            }
        }
        memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
        printf("Case %d: %lld\n",ca,fn(0,0,0)+(k+1)*r);
    }
    return 0;
}
